name: AlchFinder
description:
This is made for a game jam who knows i might put the description at the start of the game if i start getting comments about what to do in this game

This game is made by one and only person i did make this in approx 1 day and i do not know but i could extend on it but its a prototype showing off what it would be like with this game style i know there is another game just like this i think its called "Thief Simulator" or something which is much popular than this

But the description was supposed to be that you have been drinking a magical potion on the way home and you have just realised that you are shrinking then you quickly get some random objects that might help aid you once you have picked up all of the items the game ends... oh i forgot to mention, its in the dark and also you have a torch

When you start the game you start on a table so walk backwards and you should be able to work from there
